name: Snakey Paint 1
description:
This is a game where you just tweak things to make interesting patterns.  When you like a pattern then you can take a screenshot of it (print screen on windows or cmd-shift-3 on mac) to keep it or just enjoy it while it keeps snaking all over the screen.

There are four balls to adjust in a few different ways:

speed up, slow down, toggle on/off

the keys are located on top of one another like this:

for the first ball:

'0' is speed up, 'P' is to slow down', ';' is to toggle on off

for the second ball:

'1' is speed up, 'Q is slow down', 'A' is toggle on off

same for the 2 key for the third ball and the 3 key for the fourth ball.

You can also change the scale of all balls at once by pressing 'h'
